description: Lists the targets for the target group. By default, all targets are included. You can use this API to check the health status of targets. You can also ï¬lter the results by target.

parameters.name: targetGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the target group.

parameters.name: targets
parameters.description: The targets. (dict) --- Describes a target. The ID of the target. If the target group type is INSTANCE, this is an instance ID. If the target group type is IP, this is an IP address. If the target group type is LAMBDA, this is the ARN of a Lambda function. If the target group type is ALB, this is the ARN of an Application Load Balancer. port (integer) --- The port on which the target is listening. For HTTP, the default is 80. For HTTPS, the default is 443.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the target. If the target group type is INSTANCE, this is an instance ID. If the target group type is IP, this is an IP address. If the target group type is LAMBDA, this is the ARN of a Lambda function. If the target group type is ALB, this is the ARN of an Application Load Balancer.

nested_params.name: port
nested_params.description: The port on which the target is listening. For HTTP, the default is 80. For HTTPS, the default is 443.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the target. If the target group type is INSTANCE, this is an instance ID. If the target group type is IP, this is an IP address. If the target group type is LAMBDA, this is the ARN of a Lambda function. If the target type is ALB, this is the ARN of an Application Load Balancer.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port on which the target is listening.

nested_items.name: reasonCode
nested_items.description: The code for why the target status is what it is.
DRAINING: The target is being deregistered. No new connections are sent to this target while current connections are being drained. The default draining time is 5 minutes.
UNAVAILABLE: Health checks are unavailable for the target group.
INITIAL: Initial health checks on the target are being performed.
UNUSED: Target group is not used in a service.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, a pagination token for the next page of results.
